00013 /*
00014  * Information Root Filter Scheme.
00015  *  A extended 'Square-root' Information filter as an Abstract class
00016  *
00017  * Algorithm: Square-root information propogation using QR factorisation
00018  * Ref: P. Dyer and S. McReynolds, "Extension of Square-Root Filtering to Include Process Noise",
00019  * [1] Journal of Optimization Theory and Applications, Vol.3 No.6 1969
00020  * Filter maintains r,R where
00021  *   inv(R)*inv(R)' = X
00022  *   r = R*x
00023  *   R is upper triangular but not strictly a Cholesky factor as diagonal may be negative
00024  * Observe algorithm has been extended to include linearised models
00025  * Discontinous observe models require that state is normailised with respect to the observation.
00026  *
00027  * The filter is operated by performing a
00028  *  predict, observe
00029  * cycle defined by the base class
00030  */
00031 #include "bayesFlt.hpp"
00032 
00033 /* Filter namespace */
00034 namespace Bayesian_filter
00035 {
00036 
00037 class Information_root_scheme : public Extended_kalman_filter
00038 {
00039 public:
00040     FM::Vec r;          // Information Root state
00041     FM::UTriMatrix R;   // Information Root
00042 
00043     Information_root_scheme (std::size_t x_size, std::size_t z_initialsize = 0);
00044 
00045     void init ();
00046     void update ();
00047     // Covariance form state interface
00048 
00049     Float predict (Linrz_predict_model& f, const FM::ColMatrix& invFx, bool linear_r);
00050     /* Generialised form, using precomputed inverse of f.Fx */
00051     Float predict (Linrz_predict_model& f);
00052     /* Use linrz form for r, computes inverse model using inverse_Fx */
00053     Float predict (Linear_predict_model& f);
00054     /* Use linear form for r, computes inverse model using inverse_Fx */
00055     Float predict (Linear_invertable_predict_model& f)
00056     /* Use linear form for r, and use inv.Fx from invertable model */
00057     {
00058         return predict(f, f.inv.Fx, true);
00059     }
00060 
00061     Float observe_innovation (Linrz_uncorrelated_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& s);
00062     Float observe_innovation (Linrz_correlated_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& s);
00063     // Extended_kalman_filter observe
00064 
00065     static void inverse_Fx (FM::DenseColMatrix& invFx, const FM::Matrix& Fx);
00066     /* Numerical Inversion of Fx using LU factorisation */
00067 };
00068 
00069 
00070 /*
00071  * Information Root Filter Scheme with exposed information state
00072  * Augments Information_root_filter with y,Y in the interface
00073  */
00074 
00075 class Information_root_info_scheme : public Information_root_scheme, virtual public Information_state_filter
00076 {
00077 public:
00078     Information_root_info_scheme (std::size_t x_size, std::size_t z_initialsize = 0);
00079 
00080     void init_yY ();
00081     void update_yY ();
00082     // Information form state interface
00083 };

00086 }//namespace
